snippet.title: Story of a Gladiator - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Story of a Gladiator is an arena beat 'em up where you take the role of a man in search of his destiny, only to find it in the sands of the colosseum. 
For more info visit the official website on http://storyofagladiator.com/

Available on
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/848060/Story_of_a_Gladiator/
PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4140-CUSA16373_00-STORYOFGLADIATOR
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/story-of-a-gladiator/9mzll81ktdp6
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/story-of-a-gladiator-switch/

Twitter: @storygladiator
